de.nec.nle.siafu.externalCommand

Class CommandProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.nec.nle.siafu.externalCommand.CommandProcessor

  • public class CommandProcessor
extends Object
    This class implements the actual actions before the external commands. Methods in this class are meant to be called from the command listener.
    Author:
    Miquel Martin

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Create a command processor.

      • mark

        public void mark(Marker mark)
        Put a marker on an trackable.
        Parameters:
        mark - the mark to put

      • unMark

        public void unMark(Trackable t)
        Remove the external markers from the trackable.
        Parameters:
        t - the trackable to unmark

      • unMarkAll

        public void unMarkAll()
        Remove all the markers from all the trackables.

      • move

        public void move(Agent a,
        Place tempPlace)
        Move the provided agent to the temporary place tempPlace. You are encouraged to use temporary places to have faster calculation (the gradient is partial) and to avoid persisting too much to the hard drive.
        Parameters:
        a - the agent to move
        tempPlace - the place to move it to

      • auto

        public void auto(Agent a,
        boolean autoSetting)
        Allow an agent to follor the AgentModel's commands or not.
        Parameters:
        a - the agent to control
        autoSetting - true if we want the agent to move according to the behavior model, false for it to stand still and await GUI or CommandListener commands

      • autoAll

        public void autoAll(boolean autoSetting)
        Make all agents move on auto, that is, following the behavior model.
        Parameters:
        autoSetting - true to make all agents move on auto, false to make them all stand still and be controlled by the gui only.

      • image

        public void image(Agent a,
         String image)
        Change the agent's image to that given by image.
        Parameters:
        a - the agent to modify
        image - the name of the sprite to assign to the agent

      • resetImage

        public void resetImage(Agent a)
        Revert the agent's image to the one it had before, effectively rolling back one image change.
        Parameters:
        a - the agent whose image we want to revert

      • getContext

        public String getContext(String[] trackableName,
                String[] context)
                  throws UnknownContextException,
                         TrackableNotFoundException
        Get an agent's context.
        Parameters:
        trackableName - an array with the trakables whose context we want to retrieve
        context - an array with the context variable names to retrieve
        Returns:
        a string of the type "agent1/ctxValue1 agent1/ctxValue2 agent2/ctxValue1..."
        Throws:
        UnknownContextException - if the context variable is unknown
        TrackableNotFoundException - if the agent or place is unknown

      • setContext

        public void setContext(String trackableName,
              String variable,
              String value)
                throws TrackableNotFoundException
        Set an agent's context.
        Parameters:
        trackableName - the agent whose context we want to set
        variable - the variable to set
        value - the new value for that variable
        Throws:
        TrackableNotFoundException - if the trackable doesn't exist

      • findAgentsNear

        public String findAgentsNear(Position pos,
                    int dist)
                      throws NothingNearException
        Find agents near the position pos, up to a distance dist.
        Parameters:
        pos - the base position
        dist - the distance in simulation grid points
        Returns:
        the list of space separated agents near that position
        Throws:
        NothingNearException - if nothing is found

      • findPlacesNear

        public String findPlacesNear(Position pos,
                    int dist)
                      throws NothingNearException
        Find places near the position pos, up to a distance dist.
        Parameters:
        pos - the base position
        dist - the distance in simulation grid points
        Returns:
        the list of space separated places near that position
        Throws:
        NothingNearException - if nothing is found
